text:
I'm in "information-communication"  because I really want to work in the journalism for the culture (in international). I wanna do that because of my passions. In fact i love Reading books, painting and drawing, visiting museums, listening musique (go to a festivals, concerts), cinéma (watch movies/ séries) watching interviews and travelling,  since i was child.
One day I talk to my parents about work for the cinema or something like that and they aren't very agree because it's can be complicated (money, job...) so i take all of my passions and my dad foud this job thanks to someone in my familly. After that I have seen a video of Alex Dupont who work with all the celebrities during his emissions, (interviews, games...) his videos makes me more safe about what I want to do when I grown up.
So, since I'm in the middle school, I dream of this job and continue to go on other countries (continue to travelling around the world, continue the discovery of other cultures, like i do since I'm a kid because I loved that's to much for stopping now)
All of that reasons it's why i want to be a cultural journalist in international.
Thanks for reading. :)
